# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**Do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

Instead, please use [GitHub's private security advisory feature](https://github.com/claudiv-ai/claudiv/security/advisories/new) to report vulnerabilities.

You should receive a response within 48 hours. If the issue is confirmed, a fix will be released as soon as possible.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported |
|---------|-----------|
| 0.3.x   | Yes       |
| < 0.3   | No        |
